#bigRR
```{r}
library(bigRR)
bigRR1 <- bigRR(y=pheno.geno$high.RFR,
                X = matrix(1,nrow = nrow(pheno.geno),ncol=1), # intercepts
                Z = as.matrix(pheno.geno[,grep("^V",colnames(pheno.geno))]))
summary(bigRR1)
plot(bigRR1)
plot(bigRR1$u,cex=.6,pch=20)
bigRR1$beta
bigRR1.update <- bigRR_update(bigRR1,Z = as.matrix(pheno.geno[,grep("^V",colnames(pheno.geno))]))
```
